MAN.TITLE: cycle_basis
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: basis of cycle of a simple undirected graph

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a sparse matrix with edge_number(g) columns

DESCRIPTION.SP: First a spanning tree is found by using min_weight_tree and then used to find all fundamental cycles with respect to this tree. They are returned as a set of cycles, each cycle being represented by a set of edges.
DESCRIPTION.P: The graph g is supposed to be a simple undirected and connected graph (cycle_basis does not check that the graph is simple, use graph_simp before calling it if necessary).
spc = cycle_basis(g) returns these cycles in the sparse matrix spc: each row of this matrix corresponds to a cycle.
cycles_list = cycle_basis(g,'list') returns these cycles in the list cycles_list: each entry of this list is the row vector of the cycle edges index.
